home_main_title: Symbol is Rebuilding the financial fabric of the modern world
home_main_p1: Symbol allows simple and yet flexible exchange of digital tokens, laying the grounds for a more egalitarian and efficient market.
home_main_p2: Elaborate transactions involving multiple accounts are available out-of-the-box. No need to write custom contracts in complex programming languages or trust a third party to write them for you.
home_props_title: What can you do with Symbol?
home_props_p1: Symbol offers the ability to do all the things that can be done with the things that do things and thatâ€™s what you need to know.
